title: Blue States Can Gerrymander, Too!
sub_head: Might Merrick Garland consider suing Massachusetts as well?
body:
Regarding Gov. Larry Hogan’s request “Mr. Garland, Please Sue My State” (op-ed, Dec. 18): While he’s at it, do you think Merrick Garland might consider suing Massachusetts as well? Republicans represent one-quarter of the commonwealth’s voters who prefer to be registered in one of the major parties, but due to the jigsaw puzzle-like districting, our congressional delegation has a score of Democrats 9, Republicans 0.
Jon Seip
